floruit.note: 知杭州（拜命 宋英宗治平3）

person.note: Hu(1) Su [8064] Anding jun Hu(1). Lin's [7255] son, Zongyan's [832] and Zongyu's [833] father, Zonghui's [830] uncle, Yixiu's [818] grandfather. His daughters were all married into elite lineages (shizu). Su's great grandson, Jianchang [3396], was buried in Suzhou, Wuxian. Jianchang's father-in-law was Rong(1) Yi [888]. Su's son Zongyao's [3400] affinal kin [and Suzhou connection] was Bian(1) Xun [7061]. Sun(1) Mian [8118] was the father-in-law of Su's grandson. Su was Chen(1) Yan(2)'s [101] great grandfather-in-law. Guo(1) Kui [8072] was the father-in-law of his grandson or grandnephew, Shixiu [3398]. A grandson, Jianxiu [3377], was appointed to the Shanxi mint administration in 1111. Jianchang's son, Dacheng [3399], was Commissioner-general in charge of horses and tea in 1201 and Taifu shaoqing in 1210. Dacheng was still considered a Changzhou, Jinling resident, but an eighth generation descendant, Hu(1) Yingze [3403], was a Suzhou jinshi in 1271. SHY:ZG, 43.125a, 73.43b; Ouyang Xiu, WJ, 34.5b-9a; Cai Kan, WJ, 15.1a; YLDD, 2367.12a, 2368.10b; Yu Chou, WJ, 5.2b-3a. CBD, 2, 1565-67. 《唐代人物知識ベース》記其生卒年為：995 - 1067.
